articles.title: Kamala Harris denounces European explorers for ushering in 'wave of devastation' for Native Americans - Fox News
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris denigrated the European explorers who discovered the Americas during a Tuesday speech at the National Congress of American Indians 78th Annual Convention.
articles.content:
